title: Ending Blends: ND, NK, NT
description: Learn consonant blends that end words like hand, pink, and tent!
subject: phonics
objectives: Blend two consonants together at word endings

activities.instructions: Some blends come at the END of words! Let's learn some.
activities.content:
Ending blends are special too!
Two letters work together at the end:
ND like in HAND
NK like in PINK
NT like in TENT

activities.instructions: The ND blend sounds like 'nd'. Listen and repeat!
activities.spokenInstructions: The N D blend. Hand, sand, band.

activities.instructions: The NK blend sounds like 'nk'. Let's practice!
activities.spokenInstructions: The N K blend. Pink, sink, think.

activities.instructions: The NT blend sounds like 'nt'. Your turn!
activities.spokenInstructions: The N T blend. Tent, went, ant.

activities.instructions: Which word ends with the ND blend?
activities.question: Which word ends with the ND blend?
activities.explanation: SAND ends with the ND blend!

activities.instructions: Which word ends with the NT blend?
activities.question: Which word ends with the NT blend?
activities.explanation: PLANT ends with the NT blend!
